data.comment: The match is underway at Stadio Olimpico.
Roma to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Roma in the half of Juventus.
Throw-in high up the field for Roma in Rome.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 5, Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Rome Juventus's Aaron Ramsey is caught offside.
In the minute 7, Juventus's Alvaro Morata is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Roma defender.
In the minute 10, Roma have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 14, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Juventus throw-in in Roma's half.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Roma.
In Rome, Alvaro Morata (Juventus) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the home team a throw-in.
Juventus push upfield but Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 27, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 30, An attacking Roma player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Throw-in Juventus.
Adrien Rabiot for Juventus has been booked by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 31, Goal! Jordan Veretout gives Roma a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Aaron Ramsey (Juventus) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 34, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Roma a goal kick.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Roma.
In the minute 36, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Juventus.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Roma.
Marash Kumbulla is booked for the home team.
In the minute 37, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Roma’s Jordan Veretout and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 40, Roma's Jordan Veretout looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
An attacking Juventus player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 44, The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Cristiano Ronaldo.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 45, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Jordan Veretout.
Great play from Henrikh Mkhitaryan to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Juventus at Stadio Olimpico.
Dejan Kulusevski of Juventus is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 51, Pedro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Edin Dzeko's header is off-target for Roma.
In the minute 51, Juventus have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Free kick Juventus.
In the minute 54, At Stadio Olimpico, Lorenzo Pellegrini has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Roma are coming forward and Edin Dzeko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
Juventus drives forward and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 58, Douglas Costa is on a sub for Alvaro Morata for Juventus.
Arthur is replacing Weston McKennie for Juventus at Stadio Olimpico.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Juventus throw-in in Roma's half.
In the minute 60, The match at Stadio Olimpico has been interrupted briefly for a check on Dejan Kulusevski, who is down injured.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Roma.
Dejan Kulusevski is back on his feet again.
In the minute 62, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adrien Rabiot has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
In the minute 64, Roma's Edin Dzeko is on target but unsuccessful.
Juventus's Aaron Ramsey gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 68, Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Andrea Pirlo is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Rodrigo Bentancur replacing Aaron Ramsey.
Goal! Juventus draw level to 2-2 through a Cristiano Ronaldo header.
In the minute 69, Danilo instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Juventus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
Juventus to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Lorenzo Pellegrini with Amadou Diawara. This is the first substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
Throw-in for Juventus close to the penalty box.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Roma.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 83, Pedro (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 85, Andrea Pirlo (Juventus) is making a fourth substitution, with Gianluca Frabotta replacing Dejan Kulusevski.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 86, Gianluca Frabotta (Juventus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Roma.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Juventus.
Free kick Juventus.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Roma.
Giorgio Chiellini for Juventus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Roma a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
